com.wizzer.mle.parts.roles

Class MleImageCarrier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizzer.mle.parts.roles.MleImageCarrier

  • public class MleImageCarrier
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a carrier for propagating image properties between Actors and Roles.
    Author:
    Mark S. Millard

    • Method Detail

      • set

        public static final boolean set(com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleRole role,
                                com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleMediaRef reference)
                         throws com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleRuntimeException
        Read the image from the specified Media Reference and update the specified Role.
        Parameters:
        role - The Role to update.
        reference - The Media Reference to obtain the image from.
        Returns:
        If the image is successfully set on the Role, then true will be returned. Otherwise, false will be returned.
        Throws:
        com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if the specified parameters are null. It will also be thrown if an error occurs while setting the property.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        An integer value is returned.

        Returns:
        An integer value is returned.
